snippet.title: Paladin's Passage version 1.2.1 launch trailer
snippet.description:
Major update 1.2.1 of Paladin's Passage is now available for all Steam platforms with many updates, including the following:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1908480

- Updated to Unreal Engine 5.3.2
- Switched to UE 5.3.2 orthographic camera with Lumen lighting to give more 2.5D appearance
- Switched leaderboards to use PlayFab so all platforms are on the same system
- Updated to FSR 3.0.4 for AMD GPUs, Steam Deck and Apple Silicon Macs
- Updated to DLSS 3.5.10 for NVIDIA GPUs
- Added some minor aesthetic changes to menus and levels
- Major cleanup of the Workshop
- Return to menu from in-game goes back to the same chapter and level just played
- Fixed a bug with skipping chapter intro movies not working
- Fixed orthographic camera display widths for some oddball resolutions
- Fixed Steam Deck cloud sync path to match cross-platform requirements
